topics.body:
the last time i had to take someone to a movie, was when my dad wanted to see The Girl with The Dragon Tattoo

I didn't like the movie, it just made me too fucking uncomfortable

my dad, during scenes when shit would happen to the horrible, evil people of the movie, would laugh
in a full theatre
made it kind of awkward

We went and saw Battleship together.

oh god

i don't end seeing movies with anyone
no one else in the house really cares about going to movies
and usually everyone ends up seeing them after i do

also i don't go see movies too often
only when i'm sure i'll enjoy it


i wish i had someone to go to movies with all the time

I don't really have a lot of opportunities to go the movies anymore. I just don't have the time.

topics.body: honestly i would be probably willing to see worse movies, if i was going with someone
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body: I fucking love going to the movies, to the point where if I had to choose between internet access and being able to see films in the theater I'd choose the latter. The whole experience of actually getting out and driving somewhere, of buying snacks or sneaking them in and then sitting down to watch the culmination of months if not years of hard work... its just magical for me.
